attributes.action: Allocate 50 percent of overseas aid to flood victims.
attributes.additional_details:
The U.K. Has been devastated by floods, there are some victims who through no fault of their own have not been able to afford insurance, and even those who have, insurance will not cover the damage to their homes.
The U.K. government allocates millions to overseas aid, I am asking you to sign a petition requesting the Government to now reduce the aid to foreign countries and re allocate at least 50 percent of it to the homeless and needy caused by the floods.
attributes.background: Millions of pounds are poured into oversea aid. We want the Government to allocate 50 percent of this into helping the flood victims in the Uk.
